data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: You knew it was dangerous... The pathogens you were working with...

data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: Careful? You killed everyone. And what did you do? You hid.

data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: You watched me die from your protective suit.

data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: You could have saved us. You could have warned us.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: No... There was nothing... It was too late...
